Шинжлэх Ухааны Академийн Ботаникийн Цэцэ: Dr. G. Ochirbat, Senior Researcher of the Botanical Garden and Research Institute of the Mongolian Academy of Sciences, Doctor of Biological Sciences, and Professor, has been awarded the title of 'Honored Scientist of Mongolia'.
ХАА-н шинжлэх ухааны академийн гишүүн, б: Dr. Genden's Ochirbat, Member of the Mongolian Academy of Agricultural Sciences, Doctor of Biological Sciences, and Professor, has made significant contributions to the development of education and science, particularly in the fields of Mongolian plant resource studies and the development of sea buckthorn farming. He conducted research on the nutritional base of beekeeping and laid the scientific foundation for the development of strategies and policies for advancing the beekeeping industry. Combining science, industry, and education, his work has resulted in valuable outcomes for the development of beekeeping. Based on these contributions, he was awarded the title of 'Honored Scientist of Mongolia' by the decree of the President of Mongolia.
